--------------------
Text: The actuality film is a non-fiction film genre that, like the documentary film, uses footage of real events, places, and things, yet unlike the documentary is not structured into a larger argument, picture of the phenomenon or coherent whole.
Triplets:<actualty film
1:
--------------------
Text: Actuality film:  In practice, actuality films preceded the emergence of the documentary.
Triplets:<actuality film
4:
--------------------
Text: Actuality film:  An actuality film is not like a newspaper article so much as it is like the still photograph that is published along with the article, with the major difference being that it moves.
Triplets:<actuality film
